member.name: T:AspNetSandbox.Controllers.BooksController
member.summary: Controller that allows us to get books.

member.summary: Gets the specified book by id.

member.summary: Adds the specified book in the Book list.

member.name: M:AspNetSandbox.Controllers.BooksController.Put(System.Int32,AspNetSandbox.Models.Book)
member.summary: Replace the specified book by id.

member.name: M:AspNetSandbox.Controllers.BooksController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the specified bok by id.
